A C D F G M P R S T W 

A

add(String) - Method in class DlbNode
Adds data to the trie, and pushes additional data further down the trie into new child nodes Additionally, calls the function that replaces eligible characters with symbols if necessary

C

count - Variable in class DlbNode
 

D

data - Variable in class DlbNode
 
DlbNode - Class in <Unnamed>
This class represents a node of a DLB trie contains an array of the entire child level rather than have multiple nodes for each level
DlbNode(PrintWriter, boolean) - Constructor for class DlbNode
Root level constructor, contains output writer and boolean flag saying whether or not to substitute data
DlbNode(String, DlbNode, boolean) - Constructor for class DlbNode
Non-root node constructor containing data to be stored and a parent reference Contains entire level of the trie in one node rather than as a peer linked list

F

findPrefix(String, int) - Method in class DlbNode
Returns the longest prefix of data possible
findSimilar(String, StringBuilder, int, int) - Method in class DlbNode
Finds passwords with longest possible prefix in common with an invalid user password attempt

G

getNextChar(int) - Method in class DlbNode
Uses ASCII character numbering to shortcut getting a new character

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class pw_check
Calls other pw_check functions after verifying valid command line arguments

P

pw_check - Class in <Unnamed>
Password check class that creates and fills a DLB trie with correct passwords and validates user passwords.
pw_check() - Constructor for class pw_check
 

R

recursiveGenerate(StringBuilder, int, int, int, PrintWriter, PrintWriter) - Method in class DlbNode
Generates valid passwords one character at a time, pruning as it goes

S

setData(String) - Method in class DlbNode
Testing method for manual data setting, not used in final version
startGeneration(StringBuilder, int, int, int, PrintWriter) - Method in class DlbNode
Generates the first character in what will become a five character password Additionally, manages file i/o for each smaller sub file

T

toString() - Method in class DlbNode
Returns the data contained in a node of the dlb trie in String form Used for testing but not intrinsic to program functionality

W

writeTrie(StringBuilder) - Method in class DlbNode
Prints the trie data to a file
